note.p: Scottish accountant and amateur geologist. Son of Edward Stevenson and his wife, Anne Leslie, of Duns (or Dunse), Berwickshire. Lived in Duns. Died in Paisley, Renfrewshire.
Census returns of Scotland 1861 (The National Archives of Scotland: Duns 1/26), 1881 (Duns 1/14)
Duns, John. 1884. William Stevenson. History of the Berwickshire Naturalists’ Club 10: 289-99
Scotland old parish registers births 735/ 60 16 Duns (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 17 June 2022)
Scotland statutory deaths 573/96 Paisley (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 17 June 2022)
